fields.description: When both mtime and atime are changed, and atime is not beyond the precision limit, the mtime change is not saved to edit logs.
fields.summary: File mtime change could not save to editlog

The patch looks pretty good to me. Thanks [~jxiang] for working on this.

One nit: can you please fix the checkstyle issues? +1 after addressing that.
I'm going to bump the priority from minor to critical because it can generate excessive edit logs and slow down the NNs. We have observed that HBase keeps calling {{setTimes()}} due to this bug.
Thanks [~wheat9] for the review. Fixed the checkstyles.

LGTM, +1.
The unit test is irrelevant. Will commit shortly.

Committed to trunk, branch-3.0.0-alpha1, branch-2 and branch-2.8. Thanks [~jxiang] for the contribution.

Hi [~wheat9], branch-2 and branch-2.8 are broken after this fix. Would you fix this?

Attached an addendum for branch-2 to fix compilation.
The addendum is good for both branch 2 and 2.8.
+1 for the addendum patch. Thanks [~jxiang] for the quick fix.
Committed the addendum patch to branch-2 and branch-2.8. Thanks!
Seems branch 2.7 also has this issue. [~ajisakaa], [~wheat9], can you please commit to banch 2.7 also ?
Thanks for the reminder. I'll take care of it.
Thanks [~kanaka] for the reminder. The patches cannot be applied to branch-2.7, so I'll file a jira for backporting this and HDFS-11272 to branch-2.7 and create a patch.
Filed HDFS-11373 and created a patch.
